quotes: No great discovery was ever made without a bold guess.
Most people achieved their greatest success one step beyond what looked like their greatest failure.
Giving is the secret of a healthy life. Not necessarily money, but whatever a person has of encouragement, sympathy and understanding.
Public opinion is the worst of all opinions.
All problems are illusions of the mind.
Great ones are willing to get burned time and again as they sharpen their swords in the fire.
I wasn't brave, I just didn't have time to be scared.
Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth.
A single act of kindness throws out roots in all directions, and the roots spring up and make new trees.
Nothing in this world is worth having or worth doing unless it means effort, pain, difficulty.
The more often a stupidity is repeated, the more it gets the appearance of wisdom.
Life is much more successfully looked at from a single window.
Life is one long process of getting tired.
I think self-awareness is probably the most important thing towards being a champion.
To be alive - is Power.
I don't pretend to know everything; I just only speak on matters I know I'll win.
The temptation to give up is strongest just before victory.
Contemplation often makes life miserable.  We should act more, think less, and stop watching ourselves live.
Your problem isn't the problem. Your reaction is the problem.
To be angry is to revenge the faults of others on ourselves.
Happiness is the absence of the striving for happiness.
It is best to begin at the beginning.
You can often change your circumstances by changing your attitude.
It's your outlook on life that counts.
Re-examine all that you have been told... dismiss that which insults your soul.
Those who realize their folly are not true fools.
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
Difficult and meaningful will always bring more satisfaction than easy and meaningless.
To be heroic is to be courageous enough to die for something; to be inspirational is to be crazy enough to live a little.
Those who bring sunshine into the lives of others cannot keep it from themselves.
Chase your passion, not your pension.
Nothing good ever comes of violence.
A vital part of the happiness formula is self-discipline. Whoever conquers himself knows deep happiness that fills the heart with joy.
It is only depth of character that determines the profundity with which we face life.
In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
If you put water into a cup, it becomes the cup.
Every one of us is the sum total of his own thoughts.
When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
To earn more you must learn more.
No experience is a cause of success or failure. We do not suffer from the shock of our experiences, so-called trauma ? but we make out of them just what suits our purposes.
Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
True love stories never have endings.
Talk does not cook rice.
The older you get, the more you understand how your conscience works.
Some of us learn from other people's mistakes and the rest of us have to be other people.
No one ever is defeated until defeat has been accepted as a reality.
Teachers open the door. You enter by yourself.
One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man.
Change begets change. Nothing propagates so fast.
Don't ever save anything for a special occasion. Being alive is the special occasion.
